Splattercannon/ Necross/ Injustice:

Having gotten sperated from Nightstrike and Darkfate, Splatter 
cannon was coming in fast, opening fire with his beam cannons, to 
provide coverfire whie Injustice and Necross in hot pursuit, there 
to back up their allies.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Elita/Darkfate/Nightstrike::
> 
> Elita trasformed to her beast mode and hide under Ravenchief 
whiloe she tembled with fear. Darkfate and Nightrike covered behind 
two big rocks and continued opening fire
> 
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: rm2kmidi 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Saturday, August 27, 2005 1:51 AM
>   Subject: Re: A little girl lost/Pacificus Maximals
> 
> 
>   Guardia pulls a large shield off her back and tries to protect 
herself against the fire, then she returned fire with her pistol.  
Ravenchief makes a hastey landing behind Guardia hoping that she 
would provide adequate cover for Elita while they dealt with the 
threat. 
> 
>   "Ah.... now this gets a little more interesting....." said 
Ravenchief loudly, then he whispered, "stay with us, these people 
want to take you and hold you hostage.  But we wont let that happen."
> 
>   Ravenchief patted Elita on the head then stood up and pulled out 
a huge rifle.
> 
>   "WHO WANTS A PIECE OF THIS!!!" he screamed as he started firing 
at Darkfate.
